description: Defines the 'Note' class representing a user note with properties such as Id, UserId, Title, Content, CreatedAtUtc, and UpdatedAtUtc, including data annotations for validation and database mapping.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Represents a user note with properties for identification, content, and timestamps, using data annotations for validation.

methods.name: Guid.NewGuid
methods.description: Generates a new unique identifier for the note.

methods.name: DateTime.UtcNow
methods.description: Gets the current date and time in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) for timestamping.
